attributes.review: This is the worst app ever it has inappropriate and extremely offensive content. This app is burning ideas into people’s heads and it’s not good. I am worried for the lives of Americans who use this app. So that’s why I think this app should be taken down for the safety and well being of our American citizens!
attributes.title: Worst app EVER!!!!!

attributes.review: I’ve never hated an app more in my life, like this rivals my hatred for Life360. It literally caused me to lose all of my rights in just a few days!!! Like basic human rights were just stripped from me by this! An absolute atrocity. This MUST be removed from the AppStore so that NO ONE has to be treated like this again.
attributes.title: an atrocity to humankind

attributes.review: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE! It took sooo long to download, and at one point my phone crashed and it wouldn’t turn on so I took it to an apple store. TURNS OUT THERE WAS A VIRUS THAT CAME FROM THIS! I honestly don’t know any imbecile who would be willing to put their phone through this again. I will never recommend this app to anyone.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Do not download this app. After I downloaded this app it deleted all of my pictures and sent random messages to my most recent contacts. Every time I try to call my mom it calls random people in my phone. This app ruined my phone.
attributes.title: This app made my eyes bleed

attributes.review:
As soon as I downloaded this exercise of an app, I instantly got viruses. I had to find somewhere who could fix my phone during this very deadly time. Not to mention all of the spam adds and porn bots on it. 
Would not download again.😡😡
attributes.title: Tons of viruses and unrelated content

attributes.review: This app is awful. It took forever to download, and once it did download it kept glitching. Every time I tried to get on the app it would kick me off. Also, trump is a homophobic, racist, rapist. He does not deserve to be president. Period. #biden2020. #blacklivesmatter. Thank you for coming to my ted talk. :-)✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿🌸💫✨🧚🏽‍♂️
attributes.title: This app is awful✨🧚🏽‍♂️

attributes.review: 👁🍠 horribly and utterly disgusting by the society our boomers have brought to us. Today when I downloaded this app.. it kept glitching this.. this.. orange 🍊. Some of the most traumatizing things I have experienced in my 17+ years of living. This app makes me wish I left instead of my dad.
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: This is just straight trash like when I thought apps couldn’t go to a lower level than those influenced ones this crap dropped, I’d rather spend a whole week with boomers than go into this app again, I’m getting I’ll just thinking about it
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: If you download this app, you don’t support the Black Lives Matter movement, you don’t support basic human rights for women, you don’t support basic human rights for LGBTQ+ people, you don’t support basic human rights for Muslims, and so many more. Supporting this app is supporting is the worst decision you will ever make.
attributes.title: Black Lives Matter

attributes.review: This is a HORRIBLE app it gave my phone a virus and It got so bad that I had to buy a new phone i thought it was just my phone so I got it again and I was so excited when I got it but then I got hacked and all my bank accounts were negative with no money this deserves 0 stars 💔💔💔😾
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
